publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4386 Ms Maureen Watt: Congratulations to the Rotary Club of Aberdeen—That the Parliament congratulates the Rotary Club of Aberdeen for raising £6,000 to provide a covered market place and public toilet facilities for Aberdeen, Sierra Leone and wishes it well in its future fundraising endeavours.

S2M-4386 Ms Maureen Watt: Congratulations to the Rotary Club of Aberdeen—That the Parliament congratulates the Rotary Club of Aberdeen for raising £6,000 to provide a covered market place and public toilet facilities for Aberdeen, Sierra Leone and wishes it well in its future fundraising endeavours. Supported by: Brian Adam*, Robin Harper*, Mr David Davidson*, Mr John Swinney*, Rob Gibson*
S2M-4386 Congratulations to the Rotary Club of Aberdeen (lodged on 11 May 2006) Fergus Ewing*
S2M-4386 Congratulations to the Rotary Club of Aberdeen (lodged on 11 May 2006) Nora Radcliffe*, Mr Andrew Welsh*, Roseanna Cunningham*
S2M-4386 Congratulations to the Rotary Club of Aberdeen (lodged on 11 May 2006) Eleanor Scott*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-4386 Congratulations to the Rotary Club of Aberdeen (lodged on 11 May 2006) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-4386 Congratulations to the Rotary Club of Aberdeen (lodged on 11 May 2006) Shiona Baird*
